archimate:Node.name: Sovrin Payment Ledger
archimate:Node.documentation: A subledger of the Sovrin Ledger used to record Payment Transactions. The Sovrin Payment Ledger is publicly readable. It shall be publicly writable under Public Write Access using Sovrin Ledger Fees as specified in the Sovrin Governance Framework.
